pr_title: [2.19.x] DDF-5374 Allow notifications to specify the number of results they found

timeline.message: DDF-5374 Added count display, enabled deletion

timeline.bodyText: does anything bad happen when the count is -1?
timeline.author: bdeining
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -278,6 +278,7 @@ private Map getSubjectPreferences(Subject subject) {
         .put("serverGenerated", persistentItem.getOrDefault("serverGenerated", "true"))
         .put("when", persistentItem.getOrDefault("when", DateTime.now().toInstant().getMillis()))
         .put("unseen", Boolean.parseBoolean((String) persistentItem.getOrDefault("unseen", "true")))
+        .put("count", persistentItem.getOrDefault("count", -1))

replies.bodyText: No, we just wanted a non-null value that would be ignored, since the DDF-style notifications are also stored here and won't use count
replies.author: aj-brooks
